title: Description of stocks
text:
library(quantmod)
library(TTR)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)


tickers = c("AAPL", "IVV", "NOK", "BRK-A")
getSymbols(tickers, src = 'yahoo', from = '2019-01-01')

#> [1] "AAPL"  "IVV"   "NOK"   "BRK-A"

STOCKS = lapply(tickers, function(x)
    getSymbols(x, 
               src = 'yahoo', 
               from = '2019-01-01', 
               auto.assign = FALSE)
)
names(STOCKS) <- gsub("-", "", tickers)
for (st in 1:length(STOCKS)) {
    names(STOCKS[[st]]) = gsub("-", "", names(STOCKS[[st]]))
}


# chartSeries(AAPL, theme = chartTheme('black'))
# chartSeries(IVV, theme = chartTheme('black'))
# chartSeries(NOK, theme = chartTheme('black'))
# chartSeries(`BRK-A`, theme = chartTheme('black'))
for (st in 1:length(STOCKS)) {
    chartSeries(STOCKS[[st]], theme = chartTheme('black'))
}














save.image("./data/description.rdata")

title: Results
text:
library(quantmod)
load("./data/description.rdata")


AAPL = as.data.frame(AAPL)
AAPL$Avg = (AAPL$AAPL.Open + AAPL$AAPL.Close)/2 
with(AAPL,(Avg[length(Avg)] - Avg[1])*100/Avg[1])

#> [1] 321.7257



NOK = as.data.frame(NOK)
NOK$Avg = (NOK$NOK.Open + NOK$NOK.Close)/2 
with(NOK,(Avg[length(Avg)] - Avg[1])*100/Avg[1])

#> [1] -13.8986



IVV = as.data.frame(IVV)
IVV$Avg = (IVV$IVV.Open + IVV$IVV.Close)/2 
with(IVV,(Avg[length(Avg)] - Avg[1])*100/Avg[1])

#> [1] 66.02372



BRKA = as.data.frame(`BRK-A`)
BRKA$Avg = (BRKA$`BRK-A.Open` + BRKA$`BRK-A.Close`)/2 
with(BRKA,(Avg[length(Avg)] - Avg[1])*100/Avg[1])

#> [1] 63.33777

title: Analysis of Stocks
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: Analysis of Stocks
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

#> [1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


#> [1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
